name: Rolling Balls (Kracoz)
description:
Hey, I'm new to coding and just wanted to make a game and get used to coding, the games I upload will stay here as I will be able to look back and see where I started from and see how I improved over time. I don't know why the 2nd level isn't loading maybe is to big? I don't know at least you have 2 game modes!

The game is about a ball and you have to avoid enemies which are the squares, now this game isn't the best but for a first game I say I done something amazing. This game took me 72hrs to complete ( 3 Days ) and most of the code is my own, but here and there I copy / pasted someone's else. This game is definitely not the best game but if you are a coder comment on what I could've done to improve the game!

Big Thanks to Brackey's for the tutorial video, I did get the copy some of the features but then added features to make this game unique and not just a copy of his game. I do plan to join some Jam's so hopefully new games will be out!

Follow my YT I will start making some more games and posting it on there!

( I should've been revising for my mocks but instead I made a game lol )

Game Tips:

[Space] In level Mode will speed you up

[A + D] To Move Left And Right

[E] to go back to main menu

My Channel: Kracoz - YouTube

Brackey's Channnel: Brackeys - YouTube
